input_text:
Job Title: Wastewater Civil Engineer

Location: Marietta, GA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Jobot, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!

Water/Wastewater Project Engineer / $80k-$120k / Top firm to work for!

This Jobot Job is hosted by: Mike Basile

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply Now" button and sending us your resume.

Salary: $80,000 - $120,000 per year

A bit about us:

 We are a multi-disciplined consulting firm specializing in community infrastructure solutions including airport planning and design, environmental and water resources engineering, land planning and development, and energy. Amazing reputation within the industry & ranked 'Top Firm to Work For'  We have multiple offices in NC, SC, GA, TN, VA Opportunities for individuals to work on several projects within several services we offer to our clients

Why join us?

 Competitive salary, potential signing bonusStrong bonincentive prpgram including spot bonuses that can occur anytime throughout the yearMonthly review of salaries to make sure they align with the market - so adjustments occur sporadically, and we do give performance based raises off cycle Great benefits package, Overall work-life balance  Career growth & development - Several managers started with the company & worked their way up Best of both worlds: Enjoy the resources, support, large-scale projects like the biggest firms in the industry, but with the small/mid-sized company atmosphere where you aren't just a number

Job Details

REQUIREMENTS:

 2-10 years of civil engineering experience, PE or on track to obtain it Preferred experience with design, permitting, bidding & construction of Municipal Water, Wastewater pipelines, pump stations & treatment facilities

RESPONSIBILITIES:

 Planning, design, and construction inspection of water distribution and wastewater collection systems Design & engineering tasks for civil design, hydraulics, pumping and conveyance, and treatment of water/wastewater Projects such as upgrades to water and wastewater plants, sewer collection system rehabilitation and repair, and critical system expansions Assist with analysis, calculations, plans, studies, reports, specifications, permit applications, bidding & construction administration

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply Now" button. Wastewater Civil Engineer

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

Projects such as upgrades to water and wastewater plants, sewer collection system rehabilitation and repair, and critical system expansions
Assist with analysis, calculations, plans, studies, reports, specifications, permit applications, bidding & construction administration

Monthly review of salaries to ensure alignment with the market

Amazing reputation within the industry & ranked 'Top Firm to Work For'
